entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 5,971,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.o2.cz/role/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 5,626,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.o2.cz/role/StatementOfChangesInEquityStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : CZK Decimals of RetainedEarnings : 0 Decimals of Equity : 0 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/3157004ICDH3MRKW7534/2020-12-31/ESEF/CZ/0/3157004ICDH3MRKW7534-2020-12-31.zip/3157004ICDH3MRKW7534-2020-12-31/reports/3157004ICDH3MRKW7534-2020-12-31.xhtml 7944
